2a6318b4-c57f-4b3c-a4ca-f2f19f387477.description: Earners of the POCUS Certification Academy™ Ambassador badge are both experts and enthusiasts of point-of-care ultrasound around the world. Earners exhibit incredible leadership in utilizing bedside ultrasound in their their own practice, as well as advancing the use of medical imaging throughout their healthcare community. Representing their country, Ambassadors meet quarterly to help drive the direction of the POCUS movement, share important resources among the cohort to advance POCUS.
2a6318b4-c57f-4b3c-a4ca-f2f19f387477.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by The Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) Certification Academy™

badge_template_activities.title: POCUS Ambassadors are first and foremost volunteers of the POCUS Certification Academy. They participate in the Ambassador Program of their own free will, in order to build educational resources, attend informational events, network with other influential healthcare leaders, and ultimately become decision-makers in the POCUS movement.

POCUS Ambassadors should be active users of point-of-care ultrasound. The level of education and years of use often vary, but each POCUS Ambassador has first-hand experience in the power and potential of the technology.
POCUS Ambassadors will complete the POCUS Fundamentals and the Global POCUS Principles certifications to prove their proficiency in point-of-care ultrasound.

All POCUS Ambassadors have undergone an extensive consideration process, including an interview with the POCUS Certification Academy, a formal application to the program, and a review of their expertise submitted through supplemental professional materials.

POCUS Ambassadors spend the first year of the program developing a proposal, implementation plan, and funding stream for a pilot project that will advance the use of point-of-care ultrasound in their nation. In year two of the program, they will work with the POCUS Certification Academy to successfully launch and execute their pilot project, while collecting data and research of the implemented project.

c3207954-28bc-40a6-b582-f4d4a71d1040.description: Earners of the POCUS Certification Academy™ Council badge are part of the Inteleos Point-of-Care Ultrasound Certification Academy volunteer governance leadership and members of the POCUS Certification Academy Council. These individuals have demonstrated leadership and subject matter expertise in the area(s) of POCUS, Assessment development, education, or other areas pertinent to supporting the program and community ensuring patient safety through the proficient use of POCUS.
c3207954-28bc-40a6-b582-f4d4a71d1040.name: POCUS Certification Academy™ Council

issuer.summary: issued by The Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) Certification Academy™

badge_template_activities.title: Holds an active and current POCUS Certification Academy credential(s), or an equivalent professional credential relevant to area of expertise.

Must have clinical experienced with Point-of-Care Ultrasound or equivalent professional experience in an area in which you are supporting the POCUS Certification Academy (Education, Technology,  etc.). Assumed growing leadership responsibilities in volunteers roles within the POCUS Certification Academy or other non-profit organization.

Support the Vision and Mission of the Inteleos POCUS Certification Academy by completing volunteer activities that ensure patient safety through the proficient use of Point-of-Care Ultrasound. Professionally represent the POCUS Certification Academy with internal and external stakeholders.

Regularly attend and participate in committee meetings, leading the development of annual council objectives that align with the Inteleos strategic plan. Collaborating with team members or staff and completing tasks and activities related to improving or sustaining  education, assessment or community to advance the mission of the POCUS Certification Academy.
